channel.title: Film on Blue Visual v03
channel.description: Recent content in Film on Blue Visual v03

item.title: The Fiancé
item.description: Firebreathing Films asked me to do moderate VFX work for The Fiancé, a horror movie. They needed rotoscoping, compositing, and general vfx work for their film.

item.title: Honeyglue
item.description: Zombot Pictures hired me for their film Honeyglue for VFX/compositing and also for 2D animation of a storybook which I worked with illustrations from another artist.

item.title: Cyber Vice
item.description: This project required a few different things. Compositing screens (LOTS OF THEM), the design and animation of them, and a intro sequence for the beginning of the show.
